channel.title: What Is The Default pickup cmd?

item.title: What Is The Default pickup cmd?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights == 3))

instead of

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (&& playerRights > 2)

Read full topic
item.source: What Is The Default pickup cmd?

item.title: What Is The Default pickup cmd?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

100 errors nearly always means you misplaced a bracket or another involuntary misplacement…

Why not look off another source that has a working code and use it as a reference to make your own rather than asking for the snippet here?..

Read full topic
item.source: What Is The Default pickup cmd?

item.title: What Is The Default pickup cmd?
item.dc:creator: @dff280 dff280
item.description:
@dff280 wrote:

[quote=“noobspure50, post:2, topic:309252”]} if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 2) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } } use codes next time =p[/quote]nope it sais client.java:12532: illegal start of expression

^

^

item.title: What Is The Default pickup cmd?
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

} if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 2) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } } use codes next time =p

item.source: What Is The Default pickup cmd?

item.title: What Is The Default pickup cmd?
item.dc:creator: @dff280 dff280
item.description:
@dff280 wrote:

Can Some one post it the one i have dosent work good its

[sup] }

    if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 1)) {
        try {
            int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
            int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("You suck at spawning. Do it again ! ");
        }[/sup][br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 17, 2009, 06:46:52 pm[/size][hr]comon plz help me

Read full topic
item.source: What Is The Default pickup cmd?
